author: Xanawatt (Xanawatt#8365)
name: Mentioner
description: When a role is pinged, give a notice about how many users were pinged as well as optionally dm'ing users in addition.
short: Let people know how many people they pinged.
install_msg: Thank you for installing Mentioner! If you have any problems or suggestions, please open an issue or find me on the Red discord server @Xanawatt#8365
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
